docket_entries.description: Complaint against Thybo Asset Management Limited, Thybo Global Fund Limited, Thybo Return Fund Limited, Thybo Stable Fund Ltd. . Nature(s) of Suit: (11 (Recovery of money/property - 542 turnover of property)), (12 (Recovery of money/property - 547 preference)), (13 (Recovery of money/property - 548 fraudulent transfer)), (14 (Recovery of money/property - other)) Filed by Irving H. Picard, Trustee for the Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A# 2 Exhibit B) (Hirschfield, Marc) (Entered: 07/15/2009)

Summons with Notice of Pre-Trial Conference issued by Clerk's Office with Pre-Trial Conference set for 8/25/2009 at 10:00 AM at Courtroom 623 (BRL), Answer due by 8/17/2009, (Leggett, Venice) (Entered: 07/16/2009)

Affidavit of Service for Summons and Complaint Service Executed on Defendants (related document(s) 2, 1 ) filed by Marc E. Hirschfield on behalf of Irving H. Picard, Trustee for the Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC. (Attachments: # 1 Affidavit of Service of Thybo Global Fund Limited# 2 Affidavit of Service for Thybo Return Fund Limited# 3 Affidavit of Service for Thybo Stable Fund Ltd.)(Hirschfield, Marc) (Entered: 07/23/2009)

So Ordered Stipulation signed on 8/4/2009 Between Irving H. Picard, Esq., Trustee for the SIPA Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC. and Thybo Asset Management Limited, Thybo Global Fund Limited, Thybo Return Fund Limited, and Thybo Stable Fund Ltd. RE: Extending the time by which the Defendants may move, answer, or otherwise respond to the Complaint up to and including September 29, 2009. (Saenz De Viteri, Monica) (Entered: 08/04/2009)

Notice of Adjournment of Hearing /Notice of Adjournment of the Pre-Trial Conference From 8/25/2009 to 10/6/2009 at 10:00 a.m. filed by Marc E. Hirschfield on behalf of Irving H. Picard, Trustee for the Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC. (Attachments: # 1 Appendix Certificate of Service)(Hirschfield, Marc) (Entered: 08/20/2009)

Amended Certificate of Service Regarding Notice of Adjournment of Pre-Trial Conference (related document(s) 5 ) filed by Marc E. Hirschfield on behalf of Irving H. Picard, Trustee for the Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC. (Hirschfield, Marc) (Entered: 08/20/2009)

Amended Complaint against all defendants Filed by Marc E. Hirschfield on behalf of Irving H. Picard, Trustee for the Liquidation of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities LLC. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A# 2 Exhibit B# 3 Appendix Certificate of Service) (Hirschfield, Marc) (Entered: 08/25/2009)

RE: Extending Defendants' Time to move, answer, or otherwise respond to the Complaint to and Including January 20, 2010.
